00213   void setOptions(PgOptions &opts) {
00214       for(int i=0; i<opts.m_option_vec.size(); i++)
00215           if(opts.m_option_vec[i]->isSet())
00216                 m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(opts.m_option_vec[i]->m_longName)->m_values = opts.m_option_vec[i]->m_values;
00217   }
00218 
00219   int snapshotOptions() {
00220       std::string empty;
00221       return snapshotOptions(empty);
00222   }
00223 
00224   int snapshotOptions(const std::string &label){
00225       int index = m_Options.size();
00226       m_Options.push_back(m_Options[0]);
00227       if(label != "")
00228         m_Labels[label] = index;
00229       return index;
00230   };
00231

00234   std::vector<PgOptions> m_Options;
00235   std::map<std::string,int> m_Labels;
